short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Doocti is to integrate your communication platform with your CRM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doocti, a new way of CTI to your  CRM for efficient productivity to increase sales and high revenue generation.

1.Possibility of more Conversation & more Dial.
2. Increase representative productivity, enhance customer satisfaction and enable personalized service through extended customer insights at the point of interaction.
3. Set customer information into action on the phone, every time, in real-time.
4. Captivate all interactions in your CRM for complete visibility into rep and team
performance automatically.
